
## Class : colonic epithelium

 * *IRI* = http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0000397
 * *Label* = colonic epithelium
 * *Definition* = An epithelium that is part of a colon [Automatically generated definition]. [[database_cross_reference](../../ef/oboInOwl#hasDbXref.md) =  + OBOL:automatic]
